    Awin Overview

    edit
    What is Awin?

    Infinite partnerships, simply enabled. Our global affiliate marketing platform empowers advertisers and publishers of all sizes to grow their businesses online. We help brands of every size to partner with a diverse range publishers, targeting the customers you want to reach. Brands and businesses selling products or services online can seamlessly leverage engaged consumer audiences to grow sales, expand customer reach and strengthen their brand via the Awin platform. With ShareASale and Commission Factory, Awin’s global affiliate platform is powered by 17 offices worldwide, over 1,400 employees, 1 million publishers and 30,000 advertisers. Awin generated €17 billion in revenue for its advertisers and €1.3 billion for its publishers in the last financial year.

    G2 reviews are authentic and verified.
    Here's how.
    We strive to keep our reviews authentic.
    G2 reviews are an important part of the buying process, and we understand the value they provide to both our customers and buyers. To ensure the value is retained, it's important to make certain that reviews are authentic and trustworthy, which is why G2 requires verified methods to write a review and validates the reviewer's identity before approving. G2 validates the reviewers identity with our moderation process that prevents inauthentic reviews, and we strive to collect reviews in a responsible and ethical manner.
